channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Social Tape
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Social Tape

item.title: CVE-2021-24411|2024-08-03T19:28:23.811Z -- unknown -- social%20tape
item.description: The Social Tape WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have CSRF checks in place when saving its settings, and do not sanitise or escape them before outputting them back in the page, leading to a stored Cross-Site Scripting issue via a CSRF attack
